Package it.uninsubria.server.cache

Class CacheManager

java.lang.Object
it.uninsubria.server.cache.CacheManager
public class CacheManager extends Object
Advanced multi-tenant cache manager with TTL, size limits, statistics, and intelligent invalidation. Supports per-user caching to prevent race conditions between multiple clients.

    • get

      @Deprecated(since="1.0", forRemoval=true) public static <T> T get(String key, Class<T> type)
      Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
      Use get(userId, key, type) instead for multi-tenant safety. This method uses a global "global" userId for backward compatibility with application-wide caches (e.g., book catalogs). For user-specific data, always use the userId-specific methods.
      Parameters:
      key - the cache key
      type - the expected return type
      Returns:
      the cached value or null if not found

    • put

      @Deprecated(since="1.0", forRemoval=true) public static void put(String key, Object value)
      Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
      Use put(userId, key, value) instead for multi-tenant safety. This method uses a global "global" userId for backward compatibility with application-wide caches (e.g., book catalogs).
      Parameters:
      key - the cache key
      value - the value to cache

    • put

      @Deprecated(since="1.0", forRemoval=true) public static void put(String key, Object value, long ttlMs)
      Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
      Use put(userId, key, value, ttlMs) instead for multi-tenant safety. This method uses a global "global" userId for backward compatibility with application-wide caches (e.g., book catalogs).
      Parameters:
      key - the cache key
      value - the value to cache
      ttlMs - time to live in milliseconds

    • put

      @Deprecated(since="1.0", forRemoval=true) public static void put(String key, Object value, long ttlMs, String category)
      Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
      Use put(userId, key, value, ttlMs, category) instead for multi-tenant safety. This method uses a global "global" userId for backward compatibility with application-wide caches (e.g., book catalogs).
      Parameters:
      key - the cache key
      value - the value to cache
      ttlMs - time to live in milliseconds
      category - the cache category

    • clear

      public static void clear()
      Clear all cache data

      public static void remove(String userId, String key)
      Remove specific key from user cache

    • invalidateByCategory

      @Deprecated public static void invalidateByCategory(String category)
      Deprecated.
      Use invalidateByCategory(userId, category) instead for better performance. This method invalidates the category for ALL users, which is expensive and may not be necessary. Use user-specific invalidation when possible.

      public static void shutdown()
